title: Personal Website
description: My journey in creating my personal website

body.raw:
## Version 3.0

![Personal website version 3.0](/assets/works/personal-website/pw-v3.png)

Tech Stack:
1. Next.js v.13
2. Tailwind CSS
3. [Contentlayer](https://contentlayer.dev/) & MDX

This version is deployed on Vercel.

## Version 2.0

![Personal website version 2.0](/assets/works/personal-website/pw-v2.png)

Tech Stack:
1. Next.js v.12
2. Chakra UI
3. MDX

This version is deployed on Vercel.

## Version 1.0

![Personal website version 1.0](/assets/works/personal-website/pw-v1.png)

Tech Stack:
1. Gatsby.js
2. GraphQL
3. MDX

This version is deployed on Netlify.
